name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VII with Power Up Kit / 三國志VII with パワーアップキット
name_original: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VII with Power Up Kit / 三國志VII with パワーアップキット
description:
To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the "Kou Shibusawa Archives" will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles.

In this seventh round of releases, we offer "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅶ with Power Up Kit," an expanded version of the 7th game in the series.
With "Enjoy the lives of all the Romance Warriors!" as the theme, in this version players can play any of the officers that appear in the game. Experience a range of lifestyles through the lives of the officers; Ruler, Strategist, Governor, Officer, Free Officer, they're all available. Immerse yourself in your favorite Warrior and plunge into the chaos of the Three Kingdoms.
